title: Nurf AP Cho'Gath
body: Ok, Pretty much what the title says, It's been going on for too long now and AP Cho'gath needs a nurf !

replies.body:
I agree, i main Azir and we all know how brutal his poke is, yet it doesnt even phase chogath in mid lane because of his sustain, and his knock up and silence makes mages and supports completely useless for 3.5 sec (which is more than enough to kill them in)  not to mention dealing half their HP on top of that 
then comes feast, in the last game i played against him i was constantly checking how much damage it was doing (because i was dying to it at half hp) and i just gave up checking after it did almost 1500, its hard enough trying to get Mage's ults to deal that much magic damage, and chogath is a tank dealing that easily in TRUE damage.....

Lol so he had 1200 AP?

650 Damage at level 16 and 70% scaling is what it has
All i know is what the death recap told me, take it up with riot.

He isn't OP at all, his full ap role turns him into a type of assassin, for every champion there is counterplay and tbh i have never seen a cho gath beat an adc in a 1v1 unless of course the adc is behind or Cho' gath flash's ontop.{{champion:119}}  {{champion:104}}  {{champion:236}}  {{champion:18}}
No, he is the same as he always been, just complaining since his become more popular and played in competitive games
